headline: Trump says Iran wants a deal more than the U.S. as American forces build up in oil-rich Middle East
summary: Iran wants to make a "deal" more than the U.S., President Donald Trump said Tuesday, ahead of a third round of bilateral talks in Switzerland later this week.

headline: Lockheed Martin’s New Contracts And Valuation Outlook For Investors
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) secured a contract to supply advanced C-130J training simulators and upgrades to the Royal Australian Air Force, supporting Australia’s expanded airlift capabilities. Germany is weighing a larger F-35 fighter jet order as it reassesses its role in the FCAS project, which could increase its reliance on LMT’s aircraft. The company reached agreements with the U.S. Department of Defense to expand production capacity for THAAD and PAC-3 missile interceptors. For...

headline: CPI Aerostructures Receives Additional Orders Worth $9M From Lockheed Martin for F-16 Structural Assemblies
summary: EDGEWOOD, N.Y., Feb. 24, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CPI Aerostructures, Inc. (“CPI Aero” or the “Company”) (NYSE American: CVU) announced that Lockheed Martin Aeronautics has placed several additional orders totaling $9 million against a previously announced Long Term Agreement to manufacture the Rudder Island Drag Chute Canister (RI/DCC) assemblies for the F-16 Block 70/72 fighter jets.
